Headline: Loop-bound Orang Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute near North Avenue/Laramie
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are rerouted via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central and North Avenue, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central, North Avenue and over regular route, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Latrobe.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Northbound Reroute near Austin/George
ShortDescription: Northbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Diversey, Narragansett, Belmont and Austin: due to, street blockage  near Austin/George.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Diversey, Narragansett, Belmont and Austin: due to, street blockage  near Austin/George.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
